text: is the 30th Japanese single by South Korean boy band Tohoshinki, released on . The single was released as a re-cut from their greatest hits album Best Selection 2010, which was released one month earlier. "Toki o Tomete" was the last single to feature former band members Jaejoong, Yoochun, and Junsu. The song was Tohoshinki's second song to be used in commercials for Menard Cosmetics.
